description: A Flutter application's main entry point defining the main UI structure with a simple home page displaying a message and a progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application setting up the material theme and initial home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the build of the home page, displaying a progress indicator and message.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, constructing widgets.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
